title: Development of self-modulation as a function of plasma length
authors: Arthur Clairembaud, Marlene Turner, Patric Muggli
abstract:
We use numerical simulations to determine whether the saturation length of
the self-modulation (SM) instability of a long proton bunch in plasma could be
determined by measuring the radius of the bunch halo SM produces. Results show
that defocused protons acquire their maximum transverse momentum and exit the
wakefields at a distance approximately equal to the saturation length of the
wakefields. This suggests that measuring the radius of the halo as a function
of plasma length in the AWAKE experiment would yield a very good estimate for
the saturation length of SM.
